entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @marcorubio Changing what the patient is being treated for & not testing them for COVID-19 doesn't change the fact that many of those patients are there bc of the virus. Manipulate all you want. The fact of the matter is those ppl who trusted YOU to tell them the truth are there. #COVID__19
